title: Rust Namespacing with use Declaration
description: In this lab, the use declaration is used to eliminate the need for manual scoping in Rust and make names available without explicitly specifying the namespace.

meta.title: Mastering Rust Namespacing with the 'use' Declaration
meta.description: Explore the power of Rust's 'use' declaration to simplify namespace management and improve code readability.
